  • Method Details

    • onMessage

      public void onMessage(FilterExecutor executor, UpdateHandler<Message> handler)
      Use this method to register new handler for incoming Update.message update.
      Parameters:
      executor - pre-defined or user-defined filter
      handler - a handler to be executed
